works.description:
A video (Copyright PA0001678414) which is commercially known as Pedal Magic, demonstrating a patented scientific process (US Patent 5,887,883) for teaching bike riding in minutes.

This complaint is regarding the same content that Google caused to take down in 2008 (Case #233975175 DMCA). That content is now located at another site, which I have listed under the Location of Infringing Material paragraph. There are two other sites that have had identical content before. All three are connected through Carlton Reid who is well-known in the bicycle industry and in various writers’ guilds in the United Kingdom.

URL of the infringed content listed below is that of the transcript of on our DRM-protected video, which is at the following URL:

http://www.ushar.com/PedalMagic/EZ_PedalMagicIntelProp.wmv (if you want to watch the video please let us know so that we can send you access codes for unlocking the video)

A comparison of the video transcript page with the infringing page is available as well at the following URL:

http://www.pedalmagic.com/DisplayPage.ASP?I=VelorutionAnalysis&R=183907&O=Velorution
